about_the_game:
In the game, you need to protect the base from enemy attacks. You must place cannons and destroy enemies. The enemy will attack in waves. With each level, he becomes stronger. For each enemy you destroy, you will receive a reward. Upgrade weapons and buy more powerful cannons to resist the invaders. Cannons can be sold to get money and buy new weapons.

Select a cannon and place it on the ground. You can't place them on the route or very close to it. Try to place them so that they control several paths.

By purchasing the game you will get:

- dynamic gameplay, the need to constantly make decisions and take action.

- increasing difficulty in the game, which will grow and keep you in suspense.

- the ability to experiment: you will be able to try different strategies and weapon combinations, which will make the gameplay more interesting and playable.

- satisfaction from defeating difficult waves of enemies.

- entertainment and challenge for fans of tower defense strategies.

name: Military Defense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Protect the base from an alien invasion. Place cannons and destroy the invaders. Upgrade cannons to resist the enemies.
